EncounterPatientNameSearchParameter

Parameter Encounter.period:date

Searches for Encounter based on the encounter creation date eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?date={date}

ResourceEncounter
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesEncounter
MultiplesThe parameter cannot repeat or have multiple values

name: EncounterPatientNameSearchParameter
description: Searches for Encounter based on the encounter creation date eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Encounter?date={date}
